name: Pull Yourself Together (Haydawg, Primal View, Systematic, Igoon)
name_original: Pull Yourself Together (Haydawg, Primal View, Systematic, Igoon)
description:
A thoroughly played with and discarded toy has been forgotten and wants to become lovable again. The goal is to collect toy parts to become as lovable as possible.

Made during the KiwiGame Jam 2022

Team

Hayden McGeady - Developer/Programmer

Jack Clark - Developer/Programmer

Daniel Kibble - Artist - https://www.instagram.com/primal_view/

Hunter Craig - Sound Design
